source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_SEQ_00<tab>Adkin's unwavering stare suggests he would have words with you.
target: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_SEQ_00<tab>狼煙の丘のアドキンに、特殊なスフィアスクロールについて相談してみよう。

source:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_SEQ_01After explaining your relic predicament, Adkin pronounces that he will craft a unique sphere scroll to win himself glory in Master Mutamix's eyes. He supposes that an ink distilled from the regal blood of four beings can contain the power of the materia you propose. The scholar bids you first slay “the king disfigured” in the Wanderer's Palace, and gather the blood it sheds.

※The Wanderer's Palace can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_SEQ_01アドキンとともに、「ゾディアックウェポン」の再創造に必要となる、特殊な「スフィアスクロール」を製作することになった。まずは、インクの材料を集める必要がある。「旅神聖域 ワンダラーパレス」を攻略し、「」を入手しよう。

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_SEQ_02<tab>You have procured a vial of tonberry king blood. Now present it to Adkin at the Bonfire.
target: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A8001 /var>を入手した。狼煙の丘の「アドキン」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A8001 /var>」を渡そう。

source:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_SEQ_03Adkin accepts the vial with untoward glee. Next, he asks you to obtain the blood of “the king imprisoned” in Copperbell Mines.

※Copperbell Mines (Hard) can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_SEQ_03アドキンに、1つ目の「王の血」を渡した。続けて「騒乱坑道 カッパーベル銅山 (Hard)」を攻略し、「」を入手しよう。

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_SEQ_04<tab>The leader of the hecatoncheires is no more, and the vial of royal gigant blood is in your hands. Return now to the Bonfire and offer it to Adkin.
target: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_SEQ_04<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A8101 /var>を入手した。狼煙の丘の「アドキン」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A8101 /var>」を渡そう。

source:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_SEQ_05Your latest prize now delivered to Adkin for distillation, the scholar now entreats you to drain the lifeblood of “the king unchained” on Hullbreaker Isle.

※Hullbreaker Isle can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_SEQ_05アドキンに、2つ目の「王の血」を渡した。今度は「財宝伝説 ハルブレーカー・アイル」を攻略し、「」を入手しよう。

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_SEQ_06<tab>You have released the kraken soul from its body and kept its blood as your prize. Adkin no doubt eagerly awaits its delivery at the Bonfire.
target: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_SEQ_06<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A8201 /var>を入手した。狼煙の丘の「アドキン」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A8201 /var>」を渡そう。

source:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_SEQ_07You give the vial of kraken blood to an excited Adkin. All that is left is to obtain the life force of “the king forgotten,” found within the Sunken Temple of Qarn where it is said to animate the very stone statues therein.

※The Sunken Temple of Qarn (Hard) can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_SEQ_07アドキンに、3つ目の「王の血」を渡した。さらに「遺跡救援 カルン埋没寺院 (Hard)」を攻略し、を入手しよう。

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_SEQ_08<tab>You have obtained a vial of vicegerent blood. Return with it to Adkin at the Bonfire.
target: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_SEQ_08<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A8301 /var>を入手した。狼煙の丘の「アドキン」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A8301 /var>」を渡そう。

source:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_SEQ_09After taking the last vial of blood, Adkin confidently promises he can concoct an ink of unparalleled aetherial conductivity for your sphere scroll. However, he lacks for a proper paper and the means to keep the ink adhered to it. Thus, he bids you procure and deliver a high-quality page of perfect vellum and a pinch of perfect pounce.

※Certain ingredients required to craft these items can be obtained by desynthesizing aged goods sold at the Silver Bazaar.
target: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_SEQ_09<tab>アドキンに、4つすべての「王の血」を渡した。彼がインクを製作している間に、台紙の準備を整える必要がある。「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F2252A01 /var>」と「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F2252B01 /var>」を入手し、狼煙の丘の「アドキン」に渡そう。製作に必要な素材の一部は、シルバーバザーで売り出されている年代品を分解することで得られるらしい。

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_SEQ_10<tab>Delivery of the requested goods seems to agitate Adkin, and he reveals his ink is lacking in the proper consistency and color. However, he also claims that it is complete but for a Bombard core to purify the blood, sacred spring water to suspend the distillation within, and furite sand found near Ishgardian castles to increase aetherial conductivity. Find and deliver all three.
target: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_SEQ_10<tab>アドキンに、2つの品を渡した。しかし、彼のインク製作は難航しているようだ。「<var 28 ((Item)) F2254301 /var>」と「<var 28 ((Item)) F2254401 /var>」と「<var 28 ((Item)) F2254701 /var>」を入手し、狼煙の丘の「アドキン」に渡そう。「<var 28 ((Item)) F2254701 /var>」は、イシュガルドの砦の周辺で出回っている可能性があるらしい。

source:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_SEQ_11With every ingredient for both scroll and ink in hand, Adkin triumphantly fashions a Zodiac scroll. He gives it to you with a few words of encouragement on your quest to recreate a legendary arm, all the while crowing that his achievement will bring him all the closer to becoming Master Mutamix's favorite disciple.

※If you have obtained all four items requested by Gerolt, you may return to Hyrstmill to have your Zodiac Weapon forged.
target: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_SEQ_11<tab>アドキンに頼まれていた品を渡した。彼はインクを作り上げ、「ゾディアックウェポン」の魂を込めるための「<var 28 ((Item)) F2252401 /var>」を作り上げた。アドキンは、尊敬する師ミュタミクスの右腕に近づけたと喜んでいるようだ。ゲロルトから要求されたすべての品がそろっていた場合は、ハーストミルに戻り、「ゾディアックウェポン」を再創造しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_TODO_00<tab>Obtain a vial of tonberry king blood from the Wanderer's Palace.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_TODO_00「旅神聖域 ワンダラーパレス」を攻略して
を入手

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the vial of tonberry king blood to Adkin.
target: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_TODO_01<tab>アドキンに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A8001 /var>を渡す

TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_TODO_02「騒乱坑道 カッパーベル銅山 (Hard)」を攻略して
を入手

を入手

target: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_TODO_08<tab>アドキンに<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F2252A01 /var>と<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F2252B01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_000<tab>You! You are the one who's trafficked with Hubairtin in sphere scrolls, yes? Then stop moving towards him. <var 1A 02 /var>I said stop moving<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_000あーーーーっ！！！
お、お前、ウベールタンと一緒に、
「スフィアスクロール」を試してた奴だろ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_001<tab>Perhaps you do not yet know me, but you will. Soon, <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> will know Adkin, Master Mutamix's right hand! Now what is it you want?
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_001オレは、アドキン！
ここ「狼煙の丘」きっての、マテリア研究家だ！
いずれミュタミクス先生の右腕になる男だから、ヨロシクな！！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_002<tab>A sphere scroll─I <var 1A 02 /var>knew<var 1A 01 /var> it! You came to sup of Hubairtin's “knowledge” without paying me any heed. Tut-tut, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_002……なに、特殊な「スフィアスクロール」を作りたいって？
そのためにウベールタンの知恵を借りに来たわけで、
オレなんてお呼びじゃないと……ふむふむ……。

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_003<tab>No more, I say! Hubairtin has milked your dealings enough. Today, <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> shall fashion the scroll you seek, and gain Master Mutamix's respect in so doing!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_003って、ダメダメ！　あいつばっかり活躍させるかっ！
オレは、ミュタミクス先生の右腕になる男……
どんなに特殊な「スフィアスクロール」だって、作ってやるよ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_004<tab>Now hush─I must think. Channeling materia of power beyond compare into an empty host... Tricky.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_004えーっと……お前は、その「ゾディアックウェポン」ってのに、
普通のマテリアとは比にならないほど大きな力を、
流し込みたいんだよな……？

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_005<tab>Only an ink with an unholy level of aetherial conductivity would suffice. Hah, Hubairtin's beloved superior enchanted ink would combust, transferring such energy into a sphere scroll.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_005それほど大きな力を転写する「スフィアスクロール」なら、
かなりエーテル伝導率の高いインクで描かなきゃダメだ。
ハイエンチャントインクごときじゃ、性能不足さ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_006<tab>What was it Hubairtin's notes said? Something along the lines of “kill the four kings: disfigured, imprisoned, unchained, and forgotten.” But why? Ah, that's right─for their blood!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_006……確か、ウベールタンのレシピ案に、
うってつけのインクの作り方が載ってたな。
なんでも、いにしえの「王の血」4種を材料とするとか……。

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_007<tab>The answer, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>, is an ink distilled from blood! Yesss, the blood of these so-called kings, which <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> will be harvesting! Now, your first target is the king disfigured. I believe it can be found in the Wanderer's Palace.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_007よし！　そのインクを完成させて、
新たなる「スフィアスクロール」を作ろう！
……材料集めは、お前に任せていいよな？

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_008<tab>I am unsure what it actually is, so I say slay anything that moves. Yes, yes, the palace was once sacred ground, but neither the long dead of Nym nor myself care. Now go to your grisly task, and do not return without the blood!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_008最初は、ニーム文明の聖域「ワンダラーパレス」に向かって、
異形の王の血をとってきてくれ！
俺は、ここでお前の帰還を待ってるからな！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_009<tab>Ah, my friend the slayer. What do you want now? <var 1A 02 /var>Another<var 1A 01 /var>!? Well, helping you last time did seem to improve my standing in Master Mutamix's eyes...
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_009おっ、また来たのか！
さらに「」を作りたいなら、
ミュタミクス先生の右腕を目指すオレが、協力するぞ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_010<tab>Fine. I will fashion another Zodiac scroll. I will not sully my hands getting the blood for the ink, though, so I hope you remember the method. Yes? Good. I will be waiting.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_010前回と同じく、まずはインクの材料集めからだな！
大きな力を転写する「」は、
エーテル伝導率の高いインクで描かなきゃならないんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_011<tab>...Why are you still here? Must I think of everything!? Go and slay the king disfigured in the Wanderer's Palace, and do not return without its blood!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_011最初は、ニーム文明の聖域「ワンダラーパレス」に向かって、
異形の王の血をとってきてくれ！
俺は、ここでお前の帰還を待ってるからな！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_020<tab>Is the deed done, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>? Have you a vial of the king disfigured's blood?
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_020首尾はどうだ？
ワンダラーパレスに潜むっていう、
異形の王の血は手に入ったか？

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_021<tab>Yes, yesss, how disgusting! See how it oozes, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>? This viscosity means untold power!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_021おおーーーー！？
なんか、すごくドロドロしてる血だな！？
気味の悪い感じが、いかにも力を秘めてそうだ……！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_022<tab>Ahhh, it seems powerful as ever─though I cannot say I've missed the feeling of bile rising in my gullet.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_022おおーーーー！？
相変わらず、すごくドロドロしてる血だな！？
気味の悪い感じが、いかにも力を秘めてそうだ……！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_023<tab>I shall begin to distill the essence from this blood─and you will not trouble me with lackwit questions while I am at it!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_023……よし、1つ目の「王の血」は確かに預かった。
オレはインクを作る準備を始めるから、
お前は「カッパーベル銅山」に向かってくれ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_024<tab>...By which I mean, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>, that our cause will be better served if you make way to Copperbell Mines. It is home to Ouranos, the king imprisoned; we seek its blood. Now leave me to my experiments, and I'll leave you to the slaying─good-bye!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_024あの銅山に閉じ込められているヘカトンケイレス族の中でも、
岩窟王と呼ばれた「ウラノス」の血……
異常なまでの生命力の源が、次の狙いだ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_030<tab>Ouranos's might is quite legendary─are you certain you can handle the leader of the hecatoncheires?
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_030ヘカトンケイレス族の岩窟王、ウラノスか……。
いかにも強そうな感じだけど、大丈夫なのか……？

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_031<tab>Yes, yesss! Spending three centuries beneath the ground has imbued the hecatoncheires with unnatural vitality born of malice. I am astounded that you survived, in truth.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_031うひょぉー！？
これが、300年以上も地下で耐え忍んできた一族の血……！
無事に戻ってきた、お前の生命力にも驚きだぞ！？

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_032<tab>You are something, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>─back at the Bonfire with royal gigant blood in hand. Yesss, your will is frightfully strong.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_032うひょぉー！？
相変わらず、しれっと「」を持ってきやがって！
お前、実は相当な猛者とみた……！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_033<tab>We draw nearer and nearer to our goal. You have no qualms with drawing blood again, yes?
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_033ともかく、一歩前進だな！
この勢いで、3つ目の「王の血」も集めてきてくれよ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_034<tab>Good. Then cross the Doxy's Pull to Hullbreaker Isle, and kill the king unchained!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_034お次は、ロータノ海に浮かぶ「ハルブレーカー・アイル」。
謎めく「魔の海域」の王者の血が必要なのさ！
よろしく頼んだ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_040<tab>What is that awful scent? Oh, it's you...and the stench of the Doxy's Pull, I suppose.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_040おっ、なんだか潮臭いな。
「魔の海域」に行ってきたのか？

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_041<tab>...Have I lost my mind, or is this blood blue!? <sniff> Blech! And what a foul stench!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_041うげぇ～～～っ！？
これが「魔の海域」の王の血だっていうのか！？
青っつーか、緑っつーか……色も匂いもすごいな……。

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_042<tab>Only one azure liquid in the realm smells more rank than a midden─kraken blood. Blech, utterly nauseating!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_042うげぇ～～～っ！？
この匂いと色、間違いなく「」だな。
うう……気持ち悪くなりそうだ……。

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_043<tab>Still, it ill suits an alchemist of my status to bemoan the odorous. And Master Mutamix will no doubt look on me with respect if I can transform this gunk into ink.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_043だが、このオレ……錬金術にも造詣が深い、
ミュタミクス先生の未来の右腕にかかれば、
ゲテモノだって、素晴らしいインクに生まれかわるのさ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_044<tab>Of course, all this rests upon you obtaining <var 1A 02 /var>four<var 1A 01 /var> kinds of blood. You must still slay the king forgotten, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. The Sunken Temple of Qarn is where you are like to find it.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_044さあ、最後の「王の血」も頼むぞ！
狙うは「カルン埋没寺院」に眠る、古代王の血だ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_045<tab>Nothing is known of the blood's owner, but the substance itself is said to be full of magicks. Why, I have even heard it can animate stone! Perhaps a walking statue <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> the king forgotten?
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_045その血には、強力な魔力が秘められていて、
寺院の守護者たる石像を動かしているらしい……。
石像をブッ壊せば、手に入るに違いねえ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_050<tab>Huuubairtiiin, oh, Huuubairtiiin! I <var 1A 02 /var>am<var 1A 01 /var> worthier than you, and when you have fallen from Master Mutamix's good graces, I shall laugh and laugh and laugh!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_050ふふふ……今に見てろよぉ、ウベールタン！
この試みを成功させて、度肝を抜いてやる……！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_051<tab>Huuubairtiiin, oh, Huuubairtiiin! How shall I humiliate you next? Perhaps another Zodiac scroll─how would you like that!? Ahahaha, yes, yesss!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_051ふふふ……今に見てろよぉ、ウベールタン！
再び「」を完成させて、
何度でも、度肝を抜いてやる……！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_052<tab>So this is the blood of the king forgotten! Yesss, you have done alchemy a great service by finding this, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_052おお！　おおーーーっ！？
これが「」なんだな！？
すごいぞ、実在してたってだけでも一大発見だ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_100_052<tab>Ahahaha, well done, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>! Gods above, have you no qualms killing for another vial of vicegerent blood!?
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_100_052おお！　おおーーーっ！？
待望の「」を持ってきてくれたのか！
お前にかかれば、手に入らない素材なんてない気がするな！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_053<tab>Well, can we not now distill four kings' blood into an ink most conductive of aether?
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_053……よしよし。
これで目的の「スフィアスクロール」にふさわしい、
高エーテル伝導率のインクを作ることができる！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_054<tab>No. Not yet. This ink is my alchemical masterpiece, and I shall not see its power lessened by something so <var 1A 02 /var>base<var 1A 01 /var> as parchment.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_054だけど、いくらインクが素晴らしくても、
ほかの素材がダメダメじゃ、最高の成果は得られない……。
そう、インクに釣り合うような、紙が必要なのさ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_055<tab>So while I finish mixing the elements of the ink, you may busy yourself with finding a page of perfect vellum to write upon, and a pinch of perfect pounce to ensure the ink's adhesion.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_055オレがインクを作っている間に、「」と、
インクを定着させるための「」を、
集めてきてくれないか？

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_056<tab>It matters not to me whether you pilfer or purchase them. Make them by reusing pieces of aged goods from the Silver Bazaar for all I care. One way or the other, kindly go away now─a genius is working!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_056自分で作っても、買ってきてくれてもいいけど……
作るなら、シルバーバザーのよろず屋を見てみるといい。
いい具合の年代物があれば、素材として再利用できるからな！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_060<tab>Blast! ...By which I mean, oh, happy, happy day, you are returned, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>! And no doubt with the vellum and pounce, yes?
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_060あ、ああ……おかえり！
「」と「」は、
手に入ったのか？

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_061<tab>Yes, yes, exquisite, really. I owe you a debt of gratitude...or something. But really, must you always be so damned quick!?
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_061うぐぐぐ……申し分ない質の羊皮紙と、定着剤だな。
とてもありがたい……ありがたいんだけどさ……。

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_062<tab>...My apologies, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. I simply need more <var 1A 02 /var>time<var 1A 01 /var>, confound it! The ink is proving trickier than I anticipated. My best attempts are...are failures, and I do not like it!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_062ご、ごめん……！
……インクの製作が思うようにいかなくて、
まだ出来上がってないんだよ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_063<tab>I...I do sincerely apologize, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. Despite my past success, I am stumbling where I did before. It is...frustrating, to say the least.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_063ご、ごめん……！　本当にごめん！
……インクの製作が、前回と同じところで躓いてるんだよ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_064<tab>But you will help just one last time, yes? What am I saying─of course you will!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_064なあ、後生の頼みだ……！
最後にもうひとっ走りして、インクの製作を助ける品を、
集めてきてくれないか！？

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_065<tab>Now, I need a Bombard core to heat the blood and sacred spring water in which to suspend the distillation.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_065高熱を発する「」と、
インクを溶くための「」。
そして、エーテル伝導率をさらに高める「」がいる！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_066<tab>Ah, and furite sand should bring the aetherial conductivity of the ink to new heights. No doubt you can find the pulverized alloy somewhere in the north. After all, those Ishgardians use it in the building of their castles.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_066「」は、イシュガルドで砦の建造などに使われる合金、
「戦神鋼」を含んでいる砂なんだ。
かの地の砦の近隣でなら、出回ってるかもしれない……！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_070<tab>Yes, yes, yesss─victory shall be mine! Soon, so soon, I will complete my long labors and take my rightful place beside Master Mutamix.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_070負けるな、オレ……！
この苦境を乗り越えて、ミュタミクス先生の右腕に、
もう一歩近づくんだ……！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_071<tab><var 08 E905 ((Miss)) ((Sir)) /var>, you have what I desire, yes?
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_071こ、これは……！
頼んでた素材を、そろえてきてくれたんだな！？

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_072<tab>Oh, how wonderful a friend, how true an ally! I will dip my quill into our ink, and with trembling fingers draw symbols of power upon the vellum. The completion of your scroll is now at hand!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_072ありがとなーーーっ！
これさえあれば百人力、インクもチョチョイと完成だ！
そして、お前が持ってきてくれた羊皮紙と定着剤もある……！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_100_072<tab>Yes, yesss! I need but a few moments─alone! You may have the scroll, but not the secrets of my craft. They are mine, I tell you! <var 1A 02 /var>Mine<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_100_072<tab>よし、ちょっとだけ待っててくれよな！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_073<tab>Done... It is done! Ahaha, this contrivance will surely make me Master Mutamix's strong right hand. Hah! Hubairtin's day is done, and mine is newly dawned!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_073ついに、新たな「スフィアスクロール」の完成だ……！
ふふふ……この功績が、ウベールタンの奴を差し置いて、
オレを先生の右腕へと押し上げる！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_074<tab>Yet...well, I <var 1A 02 /var>suppose<var 1A 01 /var> it was Hubairtin who taught me the theory of sphere scrolls. And the adventurer did work long and hard in service of this. Perhaps I should offer my thanks to the pair?
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_074……ま、まあ……「スフィアスクロール」の作り方や、
インクのレシピは、ウベールタンから習ったわけだけど……。
それに、冒険者の力もずいぶん借りたし……。

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_075<tab>Ahaha, I do so amuse myself. The very notion that my genius is less than anyone else's is ludicrous! But their contributions shall not be forgotten when I become Master Mutamix's right hand.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_075だけど、こいつを完成させたのはオレだもんな！？
ミュタミクス先生の右腕となるまで、
この調子で功績を積み重ねていくぞっ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_076<tab>Well, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>, here it is: Eorzea's first Zodiac scroll! Take it, with my wish that it serves in your pursuit of the perfect weapon! Ahahaha!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_076……それじゃ、受け取れ！
「ゾディアックウェポン」に魂を込めるための、新たな書……
「」だーーーっ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_077<tab>I am triumphant once again! Twice, twice I have done the impossible. No one can deny my genius now. Why, in a few bells Master Mutamix himself shall invite me to be his right hand, yes, yesss!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_077さあ、待望の品が完成だ……！
どんな偉業も、繰り返せば奇跡じゃないよな？
ふふふ……そろそろ本当に右腕にしてもらえる気がする！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_078<tab>Ahaha, take this Zodiac scroll, my friend, take it with my thanks! May it serve to imbue your weapon with the power of materia!
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_ADKIN_000_078……それじゃ、受け取れ！
「ゾディアックウェポン」に魂を込めるための、
オレ特製、「」だーーーっ！

source: TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_SYSTEM_000_100<tab>You have obtained all the necessary items to recreate a Zodiac Weapon. Report to Gerolt at Hyrstmill to proceed.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL013_00359_SYSTEM_000_100「ゾディアックウェポン」を再創造する準備が整いました。
ハーストミルに戻り、再創造に取りかかりましょう！
